Posts.Content: One of the best exercises might be rebounding which is jumping on a trampoline Chris Wark talks about it for cancer and helping the lymph nodes
Posts.Title: What kind of exercise is helpful for lymphedema?

Posts.Content: It seems your doctor took you off the drugs because he saw progression, shouldn't you be relieved? Maybe the clinical trial will work better They will switch you to something else if the clinical trial doesn't work
